1.title: The Spider
1.plot: It's been a couple of weeks since Sarah moved into Flat 32 and gate-crashed Pauls quiet bachelor-pad lifestyle. Today Paul is woken by a very enthusiastic Sarah and forced to listen to her inventive ways to keep the flat clean - for the third time. Paul has no choice but to do something drastic to shake up this new lifestyle he finds himself living.

2.title: The Interview
2.plot: Sarah has got her first job interview in London. Paul has kindly taken a day off work to help her prepare for it and has transformed the living room into a fake interview room. As the mock interview progresses, it becomes apparent that Sarah might not be right for the job. Or any job at all. Ever.

3.title: The Date
3.plot: New housemate flat viewings fast approaching, Sarah has created a cleaning rota without consulting Paul. Paul is not happy but today Sarah isn't taking any notice of him as she's about to go out for a date with 'Craig' - a colleague from her new work. However, in the process of getting ready, her night takes an eventful turn.

4.title: The Viewings
4.plot: It's the big day. Sarah has gone overboard (no surprise) in her preparations for the new potential housemate interviews. Paul and Sarah meet a herd of eccentric, inappropriate, but more importantly - unsuccessful tenants. Deflated and about to give up, the door bell rings with an unsuspecting visitor.

5.title: The Christmas Wish
5.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Paul and Sarah are two mid-twenty something's trying desperately to grow up; from getting jobs they like, to finding appropriate partners, to just trying to make their flat presentable. But we've all got our foibles! Paul is uptight, fastidious and deeply sarcastic, Sarah is ditzy and lives in her own world. In addition to this, they live together in a flat owned by Paul's mum, who is constantly popping round to keep an eye on them. In their block of flats, Ataxia Mansions, they are surrounded by an assortment of eccentric and interfering characters, who inadvertently conspire to throw Paul and Sarah's lives into even further disarray.
